metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Piano Sonata No 8 ''Pathetique'' - 3rd Movement is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Piano Sonata No 8 ''Pathetique'' - 3rd Movement has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Minor, E♭ Major,  and A♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
